name: King Greedy Snake
description:
The new 3D multiplayer game The king is greedy and snakes, shocking debut!

     Game features:
     1.360 degree super free movement mode, the vision created by 3D engine is more shocking and smooth.
     2. More than 18 new designs of skin, such as pirates, ninjas, pimp shrimps, Einstein, and even pixel people, beyond the imagination of the limits of the brain, there is everything here.
      And you can have 5 of them for free, and more skins are available for sharing games, completely free.
     3. Make full use of tactics to eliminate opponents, raids, encirclement, lure, thrills and fun.
     4. A richer ranking system, a total of 4 rankings, so that more people have the opportunity to be among the best
     5. Multi-language support, multi-resolution support, no matter where you are, whether you use iphone, ipad or iphoneX, you can perfectly adapt to give you the best experience.

     slogan:
     The king is greedy for snakes, and we look forward to your conquest of the opponent!
